greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k) read by antidiagonals: coordination sequence for lattice C_n.
link: M. Baake and U. Grimm, Coordination sequences for root lattices and related graphs
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Low-Dimensional Lattices VII: Coordination Sequences, Proc. Royal Soc. London, A453 (1997), 2369-2389 (pdf).
Joan Serra-Sagrista, Enumeration of lattice points in l_1 norm, Inf. Proc. Lett. 76 (1-2) (2000) 39-44.
mathematica: nmin = 2; nmax = 11; t[n_, 0] = 1; t[n_, k_] := 2n*Hypergeometric2F1[1-2k, 1-n, 2, 2]; tnk = Table[ t[n, k], {n, nmin, nmax}, {k, 0, nmax-nmin}]; Flatten[ Table[ tnk[[ n-k+1, k ]], {n, 1, nmax-nmin+1}, {k, 1, n} ] ] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 24 2012, after formula *)
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 20 2005
